properties.areaDesc: Clear Lake/Southern Lake County; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Northern Lake County
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 13 at 11:38AM PST until January 16 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento CA
properties.description:
...Mountain travel impacts increase tonight into Tuesday and
again Wednesday afternoon through Thursday night...

.Active weather is expected across NorCal this week with a pair of
winter storms bringing rounds of snow to the region. The next
system is expected to arrive this evening continuing into Tuesday
resulting in mountain travel difficulties.

A wetter and more significant storm is expected Wednesday
afternoon through Thursday night. This system will bring moderate
to heavy snow to elevations above 3,000 feet. Mountain travel
during this time will be very difficult with reduced visibility,
chain controls, and possible road closures. Plan ahead and
continue to monitor the forecast.

* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Plan on difficult travel conditions.
Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches are possible above
2,500 feet, locally up to 2 feet across the higher elevations.

* WHERE...Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Northern Lake
County and Clear Lake/Southern Lake County.

* WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Thursday afternoon.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Significant reductions in visibility are
possible.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant
snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue
to monitor the latest forecasts.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON
